description: Localhost stats produced by Panoptes polling

panels.description:
*Interface Polling Status*
```
0 - Success
1 - Authentication Failure
2 - Network Failure
3 - Timeout
4 - Partial Metric Failure
5 - Internal Failure
6 - Missing Metrics
7 - Ping Failure
```


Polling status enumerations are found at [panoptes/yahoo_panoptes/plugins/polling/utilities/polling_status.py](https://github.com/yahoo/panoptes/blob/master/yahoo_panoptes/plugins/polling/utilities/polling_status.py)
panels.title: Interface Polling Status

panels.description:
*Interface Status over time*
```
0 - Success
1 - Authentication Failure
2 - Network Failure
3 - Timeout
4 - Partial Metric Failure
5 - Internal Failure
6 - Missing Metrics
7 - Ping Failure
```


Polling status enumerations are found at [panoptes/yahoo_panoptes/plugins/polling/utilities/polling_status.py](https://github.com/yahoo/panoptes/blob/master/yahoo_panoptes/plugins/polling/utilities/polling_status.py)
